title: In case of residential building Glass façade shall be permissible in the portion, which does not derive light and ventilation
clause_text: In case of residential building Glass façade shall be permissible in the portion, which does not derive light and ventilation.
section: Side and rear open space in relation to the height of the building for light and ventilation-
